description: An orderable representation of an Access Eline Product.
title: accessElineProductOrder

$eref.description: A reference to an ordered UNI. The UNI is referenced on an Order by customer order number (PON), and order item reference.
$eref.title: orderedUniReference

___orderItemReference.description: The order item reference for the UNI on the referenced order, or on the current order if a buyerPurchaseOrderNumber is not provided.

___orderId.description: An unique identifier for an order.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, orderedUniReference.

___buyerPurchaseOrderNumber.description: The purchase order number for the order that contains the referenced UNI. This is required if the ordered UNI is not on the same order as the orderedUniReference.

$eref.description: A reference to an existing UNI.
$eref.title: existingUniReference

___sellerUniId.description: The circuit identifier that the seller uses to refer to this UNI.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, existingUniReference.

___buyerUniId.description: The circuit identifier that the buyer uses to refer to this UNI.

___uniReference.description: A reference to an existing or ordered UNI.

___sellerOvcId.description: The circuit identifier that the Seller uses to refer to this OVC.

___name.description: Identifies the name of the person or office.

___telephoneNumber.description: Identifies the telephone number (excluding extension) of the Contact.

___email.description: Identifies the electronic mail address of the Contact.

___telephoneNumberExt.description: Identifies the telephone number extension of the Contact.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, contact.

___uniSiteContact.description: The primary site contact for the UNI site. The UNI site contacts are ONLY required when the UNI is NOT on the same Order as the Access Eline.

$eref.description: Bandwidth Profile parameters. Properties that are not specified must be derivable from the Product that is being ordered, or by a Contract or Implementation Agreement between the Buyer and the Seller.
$eref.title: bandwidthProfile

___excessBurstSize.description: If specified, limits the maximum number of bytes available for a burst of Service or ENNI Frames sent at the EI speed to remain EIR-conformant.

___committedInformationRate.description: Defines the average rate in bits/s of Service or ENNI Frames up to which the network may deliver Service or Network Frames but without any performance objectives.

___committedBurstSize.description: Limits the maximum number of bytes available for a burst of Service or ENNI Frames sent at the EI speed to remain CIR- onformant. MUST be >= 12176.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, bandwidthProfile.

___excessInformationRate.description: If specified, defines the average rate in bits/s of Service or ENNI Frames up to which the network may deliver Service or Network Frames but without any performance objectives.

___colorMode.description: Color Mode parameter indicates whether the color-aware or color-blind property is employed by the Bandwidth Profile.

___couplingFlag.description: The Coupling Flag allows the choice between two modes of operation of the Bandwidth Profile algorithm.

___uniIngressBandwidthProfile.description: The ingress bandwidth profile at the UNI end of the OVC that implements the Access Eline.

___enniSvlanId.description: The S-VLAN ID to be used for this service.

$eref.description: Bandwidth Profile parameters. Properties that are not specified must be derivable from the Product that is being ordered, or by a Contract or Implementation Agreement between the Buyer and the Seller.
$eref.title: bandwidthProfile

___excessBurstSize.description: If specified, limits the maximum number of bytes available for a burst of Service or ENNI Frames sent at the EI speed to remain EIR-conformant.

___committedInformationRate.description: Defines the average rate in bits/s of Service or ENNI Frames up to which the network may deliver Service or Network Frames but without any performance objectives.

___committedBurstSize.description: Limits the maximum number of bytes available for a burst of Service or ENNI Frames sent at the EI speed to remain CIR- onformant. MUST be >= 12176.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, bandwidthProfile.

___excessInformationRate.description: If specified, defines the average rate in bits/s of Service or ENNI Frames up to which the network may deliver Service or Network Frames but without any performance objectives.

___colorMode.description: Color Mode parameter indicates whether the color-aware or color-blind property is employed by the Bandwidth Profile.

___couplingFlag.description: The Coupling Flag allows the choice between two modes of operation of the Bandwidth Profile algorithm.

___enniIngressBandwidthProfile.description: The ingress bandwidth profile at the ENNI end of the OVC that implements the Access Eline.

___buyerOvcId.description: The circuit identifier that the Partner/Access Provider (Buyer) uses to refer to this OVC.

___colorForwardingEnabled.description: Color Forwarding is an OVC attribute defining the relationship between the color on an egress ENNI frame and the color of the corresponding ingress ENNI Frame or Service Frame.  For ordering, this attribute identifies if the Buyer requests Color Forwarding for this service

$eref.description: A reference (by name, id or link) to a Product Specification.
$eref.title: productSpecRef

___name.description: The name a product (specification) is known by within an organization (e.g., Access EVPL 100).

___productSpecification.description: A reference to the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) Product Specification (product catalog item) that the buyer is ordering.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, A Product Specification Reference.

___code.description: Unique identifier that an organization uses for a product (specification) in its internal systems that can refer to one or a set of products (e.g., AEVPL100).

___productSpecification.description: A reference to the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) Product Specification (product catalog item) that the buyer is ordering.

___name.description: Identifies the name of the person or office.

___telephoneNumber.description: Identifies the telephone number (excluding extension) of the Contact.

___email.description: Identifies the electronic mail address of the Contact.

___telephoneNumberExt.description: Identifies the telephone number extension of the Contact.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, contact.

___enniSiteContact.description: The primary site contact for the ENNI site.

___classOfServiceName.description: The name of the service level for this Access Eline. (E.g. Gold).

___name.description: Identifies the name of the person or office.

___telephoneNumber.description: Identifies the telephone number (excluding extension) of the Contact.

___email.description: Identifies the electronic mail address of the Contact.

___telephoneNumberExt.description: Identifies the telephone number extension of the Contact.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, contact.

___uniSiteAlternateContact.description: The secondary site contact for the UNI site. The UNI site contacts are ONLY required when the UNI is NOT on the same Order as the Access Eline.

___name.description: Identifies the name of the person or office.

___telephoneNumber.description: Identifies the telephone number (excluding extension) of the Contact.

___email.description: Identifies the electronic mail address of the Contact.

___telephoneNumberExt.description: Identifies the telephone number extension of the Contact.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, contact.

___enniSiteAlternateContact.description: The secondary site contact for the ENNI site.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, Eline.

$eref.description: A reference to an ordered ENNI. The ENNI is referenced on an Order by customer order number (PON), and order item reference.
$eref.title: orderedEnniReference

___orderItemReference.description: A reference number that can be used to refer to the order item of ordered ENNI.

___orderId.description: A unique identifier for an order.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, orderedEnniReference.

___buyerPurchaseOrderNumber.description: The purchase order number for the order that contains the referenced ENNI. This is required if the ordered ENNI is not on the same order as the orderedUniReference.

$eref.description: A reference to an existing ENNI.
$eref.title: existingEnniReference

___sellerEnniId.description: The circuit identifier that the seller uses to refer to this ENNI.

___objectType.description: The type of the object, existingEnniReference.

___buyerEnniId.description: The circuit identifier that the buyer uses to refer to this ENNI.

___enniReference.description: A reference to an existing or ordered ENNI.

___ovcMaximumFrameSize.description: The maximum frame size provides the upper bounds on the length of an ingress frame . An integer greater or equal to 1526.
